reviews.review: one of the best first person shooters games!Great i really recomended

It took me a long to come around to this version of counter-strike.  After starting over 12 years ago on CS 1.2, I have not been gaming much for the last few years and the changes in this version have taken some getting used to.  I complained for awhile about it not being the same as the old game.   I then went back to play 1.6 again and whilst I had fun, I won't be able to stop playing CS:GO for quite some time.

Played this game for a long time now and honestly its one of the best First Person Shooters out there,  theres just one problem and believe me when i say its a BIG one . 
The Anti-Cheat system is sooo bad 1/4 games you will either encounter a hacker or a smurf.
Valve doesnt do enough infact they do close to nothing when it comes to this issue.
For new players you will be put into a non prime match which gaurantees you 100% hackers in the lobby and say the newbies were to reach a stage where they are in prime matchmaking they will still encounter hackers and smurf ocassionally.
Honestly this lack of intrest by valve just keeps encouraging more people to cheat and over the years the community has just become really salty and angry .
If you do decide to buy this game please dont expect to have an ejoyable experience
Its trash if u want a easy vac ban
good game all around, salty players tho
